pages.title: WELCOME TO ARRAKIS
pages.text: A beginning is the time for taking the most delicate care that the balances are correct.

pages.title: ITEM LOSS ON TRAVEL
text: We have received reports that some players have lost items from their inventory while traveling to the Deep Desert or Hagga Basin via the World Map after the recent patch.
We are investigating the issue and will provide an update as soon as possible.

pages.title: Inventory
text: Your <font=text_4m>Backpack</> has a maximum <font=text_4m>Capacity</>, for example 35 slots. This, in turn, is limited by a maximum <font=text_4m>Volume</> it can carry, for example 175 V.
Most items have their own Volume. When combined, their total can be seen on the <font=text_4m>Volume bar</> at the left side of the Backpack.
Keep an eye on this and even sort by Volume in order to be aware of the largest items you are carrying.

pages.title: Primary Sources
text: The <font=text_4m>Components</> used for Fabricating some items can be found more often in specific locations.
These locations are color-coded and listed in the <font=text_4m>Primary Source</> section on an item's info card alongside a specific icon.
Look for these icons on your map to find the best locations for these components.
